00001 #include "headers/bro_fist.h"
00002 #include "headers/bro_comm.h"
00003 #include "headers/bro_opts.h"
00004 
00005 int 
00006 main (int argc, char *argv[])
00007 {
00008     int bro_server_socket = -1;
00009     int bro_client_socket = -1;
00010     int bro_spam_socket = -1;
00011     bro_fist_t in_packet[BUFFER_SIZE];
00012     bro_fist_t out_packet[BUFFER_SIZE];
00013     
00014     int i, comm_res;
00015     
00016     bro_opts_t options;
00017     
00018     memset (in_packet, 0, sizeof(bro_fist_t) * BUFFER_SIZE);
00019     memset (out_packet, 0, sizeof(bro_fist_t) * BUFFER_SIZE);
00020     
00021     srand ( time(NULL) );
00022     
00023     
00024     if (bro_opts_parse (&options, argc, argv) == -1) {
00025         return 0;
00026     };
00027     
00028     bro_bt_connect_device (&bro_spam_socket, options.mac);
00029     
00030     bro_start_server (&bro_server_socket, &bro_client_socket);
00031     
00032     do {
00033         // TODO: Fare il loop di comunicazione con, magari, una word per il blocco
00034         comm_res = bro_server_fist(in_packet, out_packet, bro_client_socket, bro_spam_socket);
00035         
00036         for (i = 0; i < BUFFER_SIZE; i++) {
00037             printf("Istruzione %i:\n", i+1);
00038             printf("\tOperazione: %i\n", in_packet[i].operation);
00039             printf("\tPorta: %i\n", in_packet[i].port);
00040             printf("\tDati: %.2f\n", in_packet[i].data);
00041             printf("\tDati settati: %.2f\n\n", out_packet[i].data);
00042         }
00043         
00044     } while (in_packet[0].operation != BRO_END_COMMUNICATION || comm_res < 0);
00045     
00046     bro_bt_close_connection(bro_spam_socket);
00047     
00048     bro_stop_server(bro_server_socket, bro_client_socket);
00049     
00050     return 0;
00051 }
